titleInfo.title: A. Grossman's Haberdashery on Champa St.

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''# 91 Abraham Grossman in his Haberdashery, 1920.'' On back of photograph, ''Abe Grossman's Man's Haberdashery, c. 1920's, Denver, #91, Grossman's." Printers instructions and an Encyclopaedia Judaica stamp.

mods.abstract: Abraham Grossman appears here in his store, the Grossman's Haberdashery, in Denver around 1920. Socks, shirts, and suspenders are on display hanging from shelves. The store was located on Sixteenth Street, Denver's main downtown business thoroughfare.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
